amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3145 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 92.

action.text: Amendment SA 3145 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S5328-5344; text: CR S5328) To authorize appropriations for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.
